english.segment1: You talk then you stop then you look at the mop-headed kid. Who is right by your side. He feels great as he takes all the jokes you create. And he'll steal them with all of your lines
english.segment2: Everybody thinks he's the greatest. You know he's just a fraud. He makes you so frustrated. Can't wait till he gets caught
english.segment3: Now he's taken all your words, Going through the motions as if he's never learned. And now he's just a mirror that you see. Without causing commotion, just stop being me
english.segment4: You get up, take a walk, cuz you almost threw up. From the way that he hits on your girl. Find the sink, take a drink cuz there's nothing left to bring. Bro, you know that it's already brought
english.segment5: Now he's taken all your words, Going through the motions as if he's never learned. And now he's just a mirror that you see. Without causing commotion, just stop being me
english.segment6: You're the scum and I'm the mountain water. Rolling through the fields where you're not invited. Go your own way now before it's too late. Just stop being me
